title: Iranian Nobel laureate taken to hospital after 'violent arrest', family says
subtitle: Narges Mohammadi told her family in a phone call that she was beaten on the head and neck by plainclothes agents in Mashhad last week.
full_text: Narges Mohammadi told her family in a phone call that she was beaten on the head and neck by plainclothes agents in Mashhad last week.
